document.full_text: heavy clashes broke out on monday in the town of duekoue, in a cocoa-producing area of western ivory coast, between forces loyal to incumbent laurent gbagbo and his rival in an election dispute, residents and combatants said.
document.title: fighting erupts in western ivory coast town
lines_and_colors: heavy clashes broke out on monday in the town of duekoue, in a cocoa-producing area of western ivory coast, between forces loyal to incumbent laurent gbagbo and his rival in an election dispute, residents and combatants said.
